message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
A slightly biased start, but you can try to negotiate!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to give away too much!
You're getting desperate, but I'm willing to give you a small chance!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it!
You're getting closer to the edge, but I'm not showing mercy!
I'm not going down without a fight! Take it or leave it, but I'm not giving in!
You're really cornered now, time to make a last stand!
I'd rather go empty-handed than give in to your ultimatum. You win this time, but I'll be back!
